page.title: 02CHILTERN DISTRICT COUNCIL
page.content: Local government operates at 3 levels- the County,District and Town or Parish Councils.There is some overlap of responsibilities. Our county council at Aylesbury looks after education at all levels, libraries,youth and comnunity services fire brigade, police, roads, street- lighting and cleaning, waste disposal, town planning, county museum,trading standards, registration of births, marriages and deaths,social services. Our District Council in Amersham looks after council houses, local and. town planning, building control, sewers,public car parks, recreation facilities, public toilets, community centres, street naming and numbering, caravan sites, inspection of food and pest control. The Parish Council looks after parks allotments and street lighting.
